metadata.title: CVE-2022-2743 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in Window Manager in Google Chrome on Chrome OS and Lacrosprior to 104.0.5112.79 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user toengage in specific UI interactions to perform an out of bounds memory writevia crafted UI interactions. (Chrome security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
